    • registerWetland

      public boolean registerWetland(String wetlandName, String locationZone, String locationType, double kmAmount, String wetlandPicture, String protectedArea)
      pre Description: the registerWetland method is use to create all the things that the wetland have, such as name, lacation, pictures, etc... pre: N/A pos: N/A
      Parameters:
      wetlandName - String this varible is used to save the name of the wetland.
      locationZone - String this varible is used to enter if the wetland is on a rural area or on a urban area.
      locationType - String this variable is used to save if the wetland is public or private.
      kmAmount - double this varible is used to save the number of km covered by the wetland.
      wetlandPicture - String this varible is used to save the URL of a picture of the wetland.
      protectedArea - String this varible is used to save if the wetland is protected or not.
      Returns:
      stopFlag boolean this value returns a true boolean that indicates that the method ends its funcion. pre

      pre Description: the registerEvent method is used to create all the things that the event have, such as type, owner, date, etc... pre: this method needs the creation of a wetland. pos: N/A
      Parameters:
      wetlandID - String this varible is used to choose the wetland to which we are going to assign the event.
      eventType - String this varible is used to indentify the type of the event. or on a urban area.
      date - int this variable is used enter the date in which the event will take place.
      eventOwner - String this varible is used to save the owner of the event.
      eventValue - double this varible is used to save the cost that the event will have.
      eventDescription - String this varible is used to save a desription of the event.
